paper.title: Counting Rational Points on Curves and Abelian Varieties over Finite Fields
paper.abstract: We develop efficient methods for deterministic computations with semi-algebraic sets and apply them to the problem of counting rational points on curves and abelian varieties over finite fields. For abelian varieties of dimension g in projective N space over Fq, we improve Pilau0027s result and show that the problem can be solved in O((log q)δ) time where δ is polynomial in g as well as in N. For hyperelliptic curves of genus g over Fq we show that the number of rational points on the curve and the number of rational points on its Jacobian can be computed in time \(O((\log q)^{O(g^6 )} )\)time.
